Summary: white and red light, flies like a jellyfish swims
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around May 30th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsSeemed to fly similar to how a jellyfish swims: up and down, hovered, circled. My friend and I stood in the parking lot of my apartment complex watching it for about 15 minutes or so. It had a broad white light that faded in and out (I think because of changing directions) and a constant red light. When I first saw it, I noticed that it flew like nothing I've ever seen before (given, I don't have much experience with flying objects). I pointed it out to my friend and we watched it. We tried to take videos with our iphones, but were unable to zoom so it's really hard to see on the camera what it looked like. Eventually we couldn't see it anymore through the trees and other buildings, it seemed to be flying away from us.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
